openaiApiKeyDesc: Enter your OpenAI-compatible API key for audio transcription
openaiBaseUrlDesc: Optional. Set a custom OpenAI-compatible base URL (defaults to https://api.openai.com)
openaiModelDesc: Optional. Model name for transcription (defaults to whisper-1)
openaiLanguageDesc: Optional. Leave blank to auto-detect the audio language (e.g., en, zh)
apiKeyRequired: Please set your API key in plugin settings
